articles.title: Source - San Diego Padres get Milwaukee Brewers closer Josh Hader in trade, send out closer Taylor Rogers
articles.description: The Padres have acquired closer Josh Hader in a trade with the Brewers that sends Taylor Rogers and three other players to Milwaukee, a source told ESPN's Jeff Passan
articles.content:
The Milwaukee Brewers are trading star reliever Josh Hader to the San Diego Padres, a source told ESPN's Jeff Passan on Monday.
Hader, an All-Star for the fourth time this year, leads the majors wit… [+640 chars]

articles.author: Mark SchlabachESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: PGA Tour's 2022-23 schedule to include 44 regular-season tournaments, record $428.6 million in prize money
articles.description: The PGA Tour announced a 2022-23 schedule Monday that includes a record $415 million in prize money in official events and another $145 million in bonuses, including $75 million for the FedExCup.
articles.content: With the PGA Tour facing perhaps its greatest threat ever from the LIV Golf Invitational Series, it announced a 2022-23 schedule on Monday that includes a record $428.6 million in prize money in offi… [+2795 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Atlanta Braves designate Robinson Cano for assignment after dealing for INF Ehire Adrianza
articles.description: The Braves designated infielder Robinson Cano for assignment Monday after acquiring infielder Ehire Adrianza in a trade with the Nationals.
articles.content:
The Atlanta Braves designated infielder Robinson Cano for assignment on Monday after acquiring infielder Ehire Adrianza in a trade with the Washington Nationals.

articles.title: Sources - NBA investigating New York Knicks for possible tampering in signing of Jalen Brunson
articles.description: The Knicks are being investigated by the NBA for possibly tampering with Jalen Brunson, sources confirmed to ESPN. The former Mavs guard signed a four-year, $104 million deal with New York on the first night of free agency.
articles.content:
The NBA is investigating possible tampering charges involving the New York Knicks' free agent pursuit and signing of former Dallas Mavericks guard Jalen Brunson, sources confirmed to ESPN.

articles.author: Mike ReissESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: New England Patriots and punter Jake Bailey agree to four-year, $13.5 million contract, source
articles.description: The New England Patriots and punter Jake Bailey have reached an agreement on a new four-year, $13.5 million contract, which includes $6.5 million fully guaranteed, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
articles.content:
FOXBOROUGH, Mass. -- Punter Jake Bailey, a 2020 first-team All-Pro, agreed to a four-year contract with the New England Patriots worth $13.5 million, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.title: Source - Cleveland Browns QB Deshaun Watson suspended 6 games for violating NFL's personal conduct policy

articles.author: Marc Raimondi
articles.title: Ric Flair, 73, handles 'pressure,' authors classic performance in winning his final wrestling match
articles.description: Like only he could, Ric Flair, 73, authored his trademark strut and legendary "Woo!" chant, before winning the final wrestling match of a storied career -- a tag-team event -- in Nashville, Tennessee on Sunday night.
